node.title: Bitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetup in Bangalore, India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Unocoin, India‚Äôs leading Bitcoin & Blockchain company is back with ‚ÄúBitcoin, Blockchain & Ethereum Meetup‚Äù on the disruption happening in the FinTech industry pioneered with Bitcoin (aka ‚ÄúThe Internet of Money‚Äù) trying to redefine the concept of ‚ÄòMoney‚Äô.

This meetup is designed to address the growing interest in Blockchain (the underlying technology empowering Bitcoin) and the available open platforms to build upon Ethereum (aka ‚ÄúThe World Computer‚Äù) along with their implications on the business processes.

Unocoin has one mission - ‚ÄúBringing Bitcoin to Billions‚Äù.

Agenda:

1. Introduction to Bitcoin & cryptocurrencies
2. Understanding Blockchain, the technology
3. Segregated Witness & Payment Channels
4. Discussing Ethereum & Smart Contracts
5. Token technology & ICOs (Initial Coin Offerings)

Registration Link : https://goo.gl/TvxVzz 

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWiR767QVFZwPntqKQW6Uq7pNNsrmK9SitVfL6HuR2i5P/image.png)

node.title: Travel to Cherrapunji, Meghalaya, India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
Cherrapunji is a subdivisional town in the East Khasi Hills district in the Indian state of Meghalaya.
